New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers extended their franchise-best winning streak to 15 games, becoming the fourth team in NBA history to start a season 15-0.
Key Match Events: Darius Garland scored 25 points and Ty Jerome contributed 24 points to lead the Cavaliers to a 128-114 win over the Charlotte Hornets.
The Cavaliers held a 72-59 halftime lead and shot 66.7% from the field, securing only one offensive rebound in the half.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked the Cavaliers' fourth team to start the season 15-0, with only the Golden State Warriors (2015-16) having a better start.
